name: AR/VR Explained
description:
Information: 

www.gdghk.org

Ticketing: 

gdghongkong.eventbrite.com

最近某水果製造商推出了ARKit令AR再次成為城中熱話. 而首部同時支持Daydream及Tango的Asus ZenFone VR亦已推出. 到底Daydream及Tango是甚麼? AR又會帶給我們甚麼呢?

Women Techmakers (WTM) 為大家找來業內人士解釋AR/VR科技, 也就來曾遠赴臺北接受相關訓練的Google Developer Group (GDG) 成員進行示範.

name: GDG DevFest 2017 - Hong Kong
description:
本年度 GDG DevFest 將於11月11日於香港城市大學舉行。今年我們將兵分四路，帶來超過16個環節，涵蓋Android，Cloud，Machine Learning，及STEM 教育等不同範疇。

自2010年起，DevFest一直是我們每年最大型的活動，參與人數由約80人到去年超過300人。這一直支持著我們發展，去為香港的資訊科技行業建設一個可持續發展的生態圈。

一個良好的生態圈並不能單靠我們這一群開發者，所以今年我們亦邀請了 Women Techmakers 及 Google CS First，將我們的願景帶給每一個人。

GDG DevFest 是一個免費的活動，由開發者舉辦，為開發者而設。在這裡你將會得到由Google，行業領袖，科創企業，及本地社區所帶來的行業資訊。

請即報名：https://gdghongkong.eventbrite.com

GDG DevFest, our annual developer conference for the developer community, will be held on 11-Nov in City University of Hong Kong. This year, we have one more track compare with last year. We have 4 tracks and over 16 sessions covering areas of Android, Cloud, Machine Learning, STEM Education, and more.

Since 2010, DevFest has become our largest event of the year. From one single track with 80 people, to 4 tracks with over 300 people. We bring the best to the community, to build a sustainable ecosystem in the industry.

Not only more sessions for more people. We understand a healthy ecosystem cannot be just formed by us. So, this year, we also bring Women Techmakers and Google CS First with us. To bring the same message to the young developers, and beyond the limit of genders.

With speakers from Google, Industry Leads, Startups, and Local Communities, we bring the best content to the community. If you miss it, you will have to wait for another year. And most important is, the event is FREE.

Register for a ticket now at Eventbrite: https://gdghongkong.eventbrite.com

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/DZqda25lkKnsI9lPO-JSNmz_tta19m1yHDolblxBfPGmpVvXL5smgq43UXCTH3Z5pvV-Pku4oHafOxk381x2iil5Td3s0PyUzKfzV9qCrih4wz4ZUoX3Zgzfqxxxv9-DkcmXEfUI

name: Power your apps with Gmail, Google Drive, Calendar, ...... Apps Script & more

venue.name: OurSky Limited
venue.address_1: Rm B, 10/F, Great Wall Factory Building

description:
• What we'll do
Power your apps with Gmail, Google Drive, Calendar, Sheets, Slides, Apps Script & more

• What to bring
This talk is for Python developers wishing to explore Google APIs, most of which can be accessed using the Google APIs Client Library for Python, an open source library that simplifies accessing Google APIs from Python code. Users who may have tried in the past, run into roadblocks, confused by how to use the APIs, or have issues with authentication and authorization are welcome to join and work through these issues so you can build awesome apps! We'll walk through some some sample code (in Python) that accesses G Suite & other Google APIs, and time-permitting, show some live demos with the Gmail, Google Drive, Calendar, Sheets, and other APIs.

• Important to know
This talk is for Python developers who want to explore, experiment with, or integrate Google technologies using our APIs while building web or mobile apps. Python experience is not necessary but may be helpful during the code walkthrough.

name: Google Cloud Study Jam

venue.name: Master Concept
venue.address_1: 5/F New Media Tower, 82 Hung To Road, Kwun Tong

description:
• What we'll do
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?

Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through 4 Google Cloud Intermediate level code labs this Sat 10 Feb event, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.

- Learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
- Learn how Docker and Kubernetes work in the Cloud.
- Get access to Qwiklabs, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).
- Get Google-hosted badges for your online profile, to show potential employers what you know about Cloud computing.

Agenda:
10:00am: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
11:45am: Break
12:00noon: Intro to Docker lab
01:00pm: Event ends

• What to bring
- Must bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)!
- laptop charger
- For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

• Important to know
*Register on Eventbrite https://www.eventbrite.com/e/google-cloud-study-jam-tickets-42857793815
*We may not let you join the event if you have no laptop on the event day.
*Make sure your laptop has enough battery or bring the charger.
*Finish the all four labs during the event to get your one month free official Google training access.
how_to_find_us: 7mins walk from Kwun Tong MTR Exit B1

name: Machine Learning Study Jam

venue.name: P4703, Purple Zone, 4/F, Academic Building 1
venue.address_1: CityU, Tat Chee Avenue, Kowloon

description:
** Registration via Eventbrite is a MUST, NO walk-in will be allowed **

Want to get started in Machine Learning? Come join us for this beginner level Machine Learning Study Jam where we will get hands-on experience with Google's Machine Learning Crash Course (MLCC). We will have an experience Googler to join and share some pro tips with us! Don't miss this great opportunity.

This course is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a practical, applied perspective that will enable you to use machine learning in your everyday projects and learn about the power of TensorFlow. This is a great opportunity for anyone with basic technical knowledge and limited Machine Learning knowledge willing to gain some practical experience in ML and TensorFlow.

We only have 40 seats are limited and you must reserve your seat through Eventbrite. Registration will be opened at 13:00 on 22 Jun (Friday). We will announce the registration here and Facebook as well.

**We will run through the first 4 modules of ML Concepts, which include hands-on Playground and TF coding exercise**

** It will be conducted in Cantonese but the content is in English **

** Bring your laptop! **

name: Women Techmakers: Insider Tips to Kick Off Your Tech Career💼🍕

venue.name: SEEK Asia
venue.address_1: 11/F, Guardian House, 32 Oi Kwan Road, Wan Chai

description:
Get the Free Ticket here: http://gdghongkong.eventbrite.com/
軟件開發行業的職位廣告的要求經常寫了多種技術名稱，是否需要懂得全部才有機會得到interview？又是否必需IT相關學位？ 太多技術又應該如何開始學起？

• What we'll do
WTM HK今次邀請到兩位軟件開發行業的資深行內人士來分享加入此行業的"Must Have" & "Good to Have"的技術/技能要求，及分享選用人才心得。 今次活動除了有talk sharing，還著重跟嘉賓及在場行內行外人的交流分享！

嘉賓簡介：

Ben Cheng，Co-Founder of Oursky
Oursky是一間Web / Mobile產品開發工作室，在香港及台灣都有開發團隊。他們活躍於大大小小的科技會議，更發佈自己的open-source library。他們的office有豐富娛樂設施，還有幾位貓主子長駐office。可能係香港最吸引的工作環境之一！

Ray Hui，Manager, Organisation & Talent Development of HK01
HK01除了是一間傳媒公司，現在已逐漸轉型為一間互聯網企業，透過提供多元化Internet services成為香港人生活平台。近年大量招聘組成了一個龐大的本地及內地開發團隊，成為IT界搵工熱話。

歡迎初入行或有與趣加入軟件開發行業的人士參加！同時歡迎已在此行業的engineer、項目經理等等來到一起交流入行心得。 不是女性都歡迎參加！

特別鳴謝場地贊助： jobsDB (SEEK Asia)

活動流程:
7:00pm Pizza Time🍕 & Networking
7:30pm Ben's sharing (Cantonese)
8:00pm Q&A, free chat with the Ben & Ray
9:00pm end

• Important to know
Event Language: Cantonese
Free Ticket here: http://gdghongkong.eventbrite.com/

• About WTM
Women Techmakers (WTM)是一個由Google支持的國際計劃，一直透過提供技術分享、資源、聚會，致力支持及凝聚在Technology行業女性，同時鼓勵更加女性加入此行業。

name: Build Actions for Your Community

venue.name: City University of Hong Kong
venue.address_1: P4302, Purple Zone, 4/F, Academic Building 1,

description:
***Must Register on Eventbrite http://gdghongkong.eventbrite.com/***

• What we'll do
Trying to do something by saying "OK Google"? Want to know more about Actions on Google?

We are having a code-lab about Actions on Google. Please bring an notebook computer.

To encourage attendants to build great apps for the Google Assistant, we have two community programs:
1) program by GDG Hong Kong
All attendants who has completed the codelab in the event(must registered on Eventbrite and check-in on event day 14/07/18), and later successfully published the app to Google Actions directory, will be able to get a Google Home mini device for free. Program Details and terms will be announced in the event. We reserved 20 Home mini for this program.
2) program by Google
For all developers(not only attendants of this event) who submitted an eligible app to Google Actions directory before July 31, 2018 at 11:59 PM (PST) and successfully approved by Google, will get a shirt + cloud credits for a year, and may get a Google Home device for further checkpoint achieved.
Details: https://developers.google.com/actions/community/

Content level: Beginner
Language: Cantonese, with English slides

• What to bring
Notebook Computer.

• Important to know
*Must Register on Eventbrite
*We may not let you join the event if you have no laptop on the event day.
*Make sure your laptop has enough battery or bring the charger.

name: Women Techmakers: Build Actions for Your Community (Beginner CodeLab)

venue.name: G5-317, City University of Hong Kong
venue.address_1: G5-317, Yeung Kin Man Acad Building

description:
***Must Register on Eventbrite***

• What we'll do
Trying to do something by saying "OK Google"? Want to know more about Actions on Google?

We are having a code-lab about Actions on Google. Please bring an notebook computer.

To encourage attendants to build great apps for the Google Assistant, we have a reward program by WTM Hong Kong: All attendants who has completed the codelab in the event(must registered on Eventbrite and check-in on event day 12/01/19), and later successfully published the app to Google Actions directory, will be able to get a Google Home mini device for free(a date after 12/01/19, to be announced later). Program Details and terms will be announced in the event. We reserved 20 Home mini for this program.

This time we reserve more seats for female. For male member who would like to attend, please bring 1 female friend with you to the event. Please get the ticket on Eventbrite. http://gdghongkong.eventbrite.com/

Content level: Beginner
Language: Cantonese, with English slides

• What to bring
Notebook Computer.

• Important to know
*Must Register on Eventbrite http://gdghongkong.eventbrite.com/
*We may not let you join the event if you have no laptop on the event day.
*Make sure your laptop has enough battery or bring the charger.

Women Techmakers (WTM)是一個由Google支持的國際計劃，一直透過提供技術分享、資源、聚會，致力支持及凝聚在Technology行業女性，同時鼓勵更加女性加入此行業。

name: Introduction to Google Maps Platform

venue.address_1: 72 Tat Chee Ave

description:
Read me First:
Registration starts on 1 MAR 2019, 12 PM ON EVENTBRITE.
(https://www.eventbrite.com/e/introduction-to-google-maps-platform-tickets-57488732346)

Due to security reason, please register using your real name or your registration will be canceled. You may be asked to present your photo ID upon check-in.

No walk-in is allowed.

Speakers & Topics:
Alex Muramoto (Developer Advocate at Google) - Introduction to Google Maps Platforms
Homing Tam (Google Developer Expert, Product Manager at Lalamove) - Transitioning to Google Maps Platform & how we use Maps at Lalamove

Special thanks for Lalamove for sponsoring light food and beverages for the event!
how_to_find_us: Take exit C1 of Kowloon Tong MTR Station. Walk uphill until you reach Tat Chee Avenue, make a left turn and walk along Tat Chee Avenue until you reach the building with a glassy outlook.
